description: Stops the running elastic cluster that is specified by clusterArn. The elastic cluster must be in the available state.

parameters.name: clusterArn
parameters.description: The ARN identifier of the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: adminUserName
nested_items.description: The name of the elastic cluster administrator.

nested_items.name: authType
nested_items.description: The authentication type for the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: backupRetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The number of days for which automatic snapshots are retained.

nested_items.name: clusterArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: clusterEndpoint
nested_items.description: The URL used to connect to the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: clusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time when the elastic cluster was created in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key identifier to use to encrypt the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: preferredBackupWindow
nested_items.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created if automated backups are enabled, as determined by backupRetentionPeriod.

nested_items.name: preferredMaintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: shardCapacity
nested_items.description: The number of vCPUs assigned to each elastic cluster shard. Maximum is 64. Allowed values are 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64.

nested_items.name: shardCount
nested_items.description: The number of shards assigned to the elastic cluster. Maximum is 32.

nested_items.name: shardInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of replica instances applying to all shards in the cluster. A shardInstanceCount value of 1 means there is one writer instance, and any additional instances are replicas that can be used for reads and to improve availability.

nested_items.name: shards
nested_items.description: The total number of shards in the cluster.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time when the shard was created in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: shardId
nested_items.description: The ID of the shard.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the shard.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 subnet IDs for the elastic cluster.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: vpcSecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: A list of EC2 VPC security groups associated with thie elastic cluster.
(string) ---
